SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into five_ed_major_drawing_check_detail (check_id, step_id, build_id, build_name, major_name, draw_no, secret_level, is_change, build_area, foreign_page, inland_page, inland_a1_page, draw_number, draw_a1_number, copy_number, dept_name, dept_id, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{checkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buildId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buildName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secretLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{change,jdbcType=BIT}, #{buildArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foreignPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inlandPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inlandA1Page,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawA1Number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{copyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update five_ed_major_drawing_check_detail set check_id = #{checkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, step_id = #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, build_id = #{buildId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, build_name = #{buildName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major_name = #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, draw_no = #{drawNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, secret_level = #{secretLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_change = #{change,jdbcType=BIT}, build_area = #{buildArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, foreign_page = #{foreignPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inland_page = #{inlandPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inland_a1_page = #{inlandA1Page,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, draw_number = #{drawNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, draw_a1_number = #{drawA1Number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, copy_number = #{copyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, check_id, step_id, build_id, build_name, major_name, draw_no, secret_level, is_change, build_area, foreign_page, inland_page, inland_a1_page, draw_number, draw_a1_number, copy_number, dept_name, dept_id, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified from five_ed_major_drawing_check_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, check_id, step_id, build_id, build_name, major_name, draw_no, secret_level, is_change, build_area, foreign_page, inland_page, inland_a1_page, draw_number, draw_a1_number, copy_number, dept_name, dept_id, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified from five_ed_major_drawing_check_detail
order by id desc
